body_html: Very interesting test failure. The TestNN.test_L1Loss fails if its target=torch.randn(2, 3, 4) is generated after setting seed (https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/common_nn.py#L239). I'm investigating this.
body_text: Very interesting test failure. The TestNN.test_L1Loss fails if its target=torch.randn(2, 3, 4) is generated after setting seed (https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/common_nn.py#L239). I'm investigating this.
body: Very interesting test failure. The `TestNN.test_L1Loss` fails if its `target=torch.randn(2, 3, 4)` is generated after setting seed (https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/common_nn.py#L239). I'm investigating this.
